authors: Glen Cooper, JVC Parry, Phil Beckwith, James Introcaso, Cindy Moore, Tony Petrecca, Benoit de Bernardy, Jeff C. Stevens, Shawn Merwin, Travis Legge, Elven Tower, Scott Bean, Kelsey Dionne, Emmet Byrne, Marc Altfuldisch PLUS MANY MORE!

trait.name: Grim Harvest
entries: When the necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct or undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell’s level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

action.name: Talon
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: Melee Spell Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 ({@dice 2d4}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necromancer is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

monster.name: Abyssal Giant Lizard
monster.languages: understands Abyssal and Draconic but cannot speak

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the abyssal giant lizard can take a bonus action to make a bite attack against a different creature.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) piercing plus 5 ({@dice 2d4}) poison damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the arachtus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a group of cacti.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The arachtus has advantage against creatures it has surprised.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the arachtus can move up to its speed towards a hostile creature that it can see or sense with its tremorsense.

trait.name: Spiked Body
entries: A creature that touches the arachtus or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@dice 1d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arachtus makes one bite attack and one spine flick attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spine Flick
entries: The arachtus uses its hind legs to flick the spines on its back in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@dice 2d10}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Point Blank Shot
entries: The arrow demon can ignore disadvantage on an attack roll if they are within 5 feet of a hostile creature who they can see and isn’t incapacitated.

trait.name: Large Weapon Wielder
entries: The arrow demon can wield weapons up to one size larger than their size would allow.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arrow demon makes two large longbow attacks or claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 ({@dice 1d8+4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The arrow demon’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: Once per round, if the Aurochon fails a saving throw, it can use its reaction to succeed instead.

trait.name: Enshrouded
entries: Shadows cling to the Aurochon, increasing its Armor Class by two and providing resistance to piercing damage. In bright daylight, these bonuses are removed.

trait.name: Born of the Void
entries: Upon its death, the Aurochon’s form seeks to return to its cosmic home. The Aurochon’s corpse crystallizes and breaks apart into shards of dark ice which quickly melt away.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +9} to hit, reach 5 ft., two targets. Hit: 9 ({@dice 1d6+5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Frozen Breath
entries: The Aurochon exhales in a 25-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@dice 2d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Trample
entries: The Aurochon stomps around the battlefield, knocking opponents to the ground. All opponents within 20 feet of the creature must succeed at a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or else fall prone and take 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Thrum of Fear
entries: A burst of sound erupts from the Aurochon, affecting all opponents within earshot. Anyone affected must succeed at a DC 12 Charisma saving throw. Opponents who fail cannot move closer to the Aurochon next turn.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@dice 1d6}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Azer Acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The Azer Acolyte has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, the Azer Priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@dice 1d6}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Azer Priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The Azer Priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Compact Body
entries: As a bonus action on its turn, the ankashar can fold in its wings and retract its legs. Whilst in the form, it cannot fly or use attack actions, but counts as Medium size and gains advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. It can end this form as a bonus action on subsequent turns.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ankashar has advantage on savingthrows against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankashar makes two attacks with its bite, or one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the ankashar can knock the target prone.

action.name: Gaze of Madness (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The ankashar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw against this magic or take 10 ({@dice 3d6}) psychic damage and suffer one level of short-term madness.
